meanings.definition: Consisting of dissimilar or diverse elements or parts.
meanings.sent1: The classroom was heterogenous with students from different countries.
meanings.sent2: The garden had a heterogenous mix of flowers in various colors and sizes.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing to see the heterogenous group of animals at the zoo trying to get along.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like a heterogenous puzzle, each piece unique and distinct.
meanings.sent5: The artist created a heterogenous masterpiece using a blend of styles and techniques.

meanings.definition: Not uniform in structure or composition.
meanings.sent1: The cake had a heterogenous texture, with crunchy nuts and soft cream.
meanings.sent2: The forest was heterogenous, with tall trees, bushes, and small plants scattered around.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing to watch the heterogenous mix of colors in the paint swirl together.
meanings.sent4: Her music playlist was a heterogenous collection of genres, from classical to rock.
meanings.sent5: The city skyline was a heterogenous sight, with modern skyscrapers next to historic buildings.
